TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit TaiwanCalendar extends System.Globalization.Calendar

summary.span: 台湾日历。

span.span: the Taiwan calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 台湾历的工作方式与公历完全相同, 不同之处在于年和纪元不同。The Taiwan calendar works exactly like the Gregorian calendar, except that the year and era are different. 类仅识别当前纪元。The class recognizes only the current era. > [!NOTE] > 有关使用 .NET Framework 中的类和其他 calendar 类的信息, 请参阅使用[日历](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md)。For information about using the class and the other calendar classes in the .NET Framework, see [Working with Calendars](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md). 台湾日历中的闰年对应于公历中的相同闰年。Leap years in the Taiwan calendar correspond to the same leap years in the Gregorian calendar. 公历中的闰年定义为可被四整除的公历年份, 但它可被100整除。A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a Gregorian year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100. 但是, 400 可以整除的公历年是闰年。However, Gregorian years that are divisible by 400 are leap years. 一个常见年份有365天, 闰年有366天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 台湾日历包含12个月, 每个月28到31天:The Taiwan calendar has 12 months with 28 to 31 days each: |GetMonth 值GetMonth value|月份Month|常见年份中的天数Days in common years|闰年中的天数Days in leap years| |--------------------|-----------|--------------------------|------------------------| |11|1月 (1 月)1月 (January)|3131|3131| |22|2月 (2 月)2月 (February)|2828|2929| |33|3月 (三月)3月 (March)|3131|3131| |44|4月 (四月)4月 (April)|3030|3030| |55|5月 (可能为)5月 (May)|3131|3131| |66|6月 (6 月)6月 (June)|3030|3030| |77|7月 (7 月)7月 (July)|3131|3131| |88|8月 (8 月)8月 (August)|3131|3131| |99|9月 (9 月)9月 (September)|3030|3030| |1010|10月 (10 月)10月 (October)|3131|3131| |1111|11月 (11 月)11月 (November)|3030|3030| |1212|12月 (12 月)12月 (December)|3131|3131| 2月在闰年中有29天, 在常见年份内有28天。February has 29 days during leap years and 28 during common years. 日期公元2001年1月1日The date January 1, 2001 C.E. 在公历中, 相当于台湾历当前纪元年份90年1月的第一天。in the Gregorian calendar is equivalent to the first day of January in the year 90 of the current era in the Taiwan calendar. 每个都支持一组日历。Each supports a set of calendars. 属性返回区域性的默认日历, 属性返回一个数组, 该数组包含该区域性支持的所有日历。 The property returns the default calendar for the culture, and the property returns an array containing all the calendars supported by the culture. 若要更改使用的日历, 应用程序应将的属性设置为新的。To change the calendar used by a , the application should set the property of to a new .

para.span: -如果 为,但不是 "zh-chs", 则和将返回空字符串 ("")。

span.span: - If is the but the is not "zh-TW", then , , and return an empty string ("").
Working with Calendars

param.name: time
param.span: 将向其添加月数的 。

span.span: The to which to add months.

param.name: months
param.span: 要添加的月数。

span.span: The number of months to add.

summary.span: 返回与指定 相距指定月数的 。

span.span: Returns a that is the specified number of months away from the specified .

returns.span: 将指定月数添加到指定的 中时得到的 。

span.span: The that results from adding the specified number of months to the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果生成的日期不是结果年份的结果月份中的有效日期, 则结果中的日部分会受到影响。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它将更改为生成的年份中的最后一个有效日。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 如果生成的月份超出了指定的年份, 则结果中的年份部分会受到影响。The year part of the resulting is affected if the resulting month is outside the year of the specified . 此实现仅支持当前纪元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此, 如果生成的年份超出指定的纪元, 则会引发。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 生成的的时间部分与指定的相同。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 例如, 如果指定的月份是10月 (包含31天), 则指定的日期是该月的第31天, 而`months`参数的值为 6, 则生成的年份比指定年份多一, 生成的月份是四月, 生成的 day 为第30天, 即4月份的最后一天。For example, if the specified month is October, which has 31 days, the specified day is the 31st day of that month, and the value of the `months` parameter is 6, the resulting year is one more than the specified year, the resulting month is April, and the resulting day is the 30th day, which is the last day in April. 如果`months`参数的值为负, 则生成的值早于指定的。If the value of the `months` parameter is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 返回 的值的属性始终相等。The property of the returned value always equals . 可以通过调用 `time` 方法来保留参数的属性,如下面的示例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#5)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet/CPP/taiwancalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet/CS/taiwancalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet/VB/taiwancalendar_addget.vb#1)]

is less than -120000.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果生成的日期不是结果年份的结果月份中的有效日期, 则结果中的日部分会受到影响。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它将更改为生成的年份中的最后一个有效日。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 所得的月份部分将保持与指定的相同。The month part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 此实现仅支持当前纪元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此, 如果生成的年份超出指定的纪元, 则会引发。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 生成的的时间部分与指定的相同。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 例如, 2 月有28天, 在闰年有29天时除外。For example, February has 28 days, except during leap years when it has 29 days. 如果指定的日期是闰年中2月29日的值, 并且的值`years`为 1, 则生成的日期为下一年2月28日。If the specified date is the 29th day of February in a leap year and the value of `years` is 1, the resulting date is the 28th day of February in the following year. 如果`years`为负, 则生成的早于指定的。If `years` is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 返回 的值的属性始终相等。The property of the returned value always equals . 可以通过调用 `time` 方法来保留参数的属性,如下面的示例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#8)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了方法的用法。The following code example displays the use of the method. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet/CPP/taiwancalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet/CS/taiwancalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet/VB/taiwancalendar_addget.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取 中的纪元列表。

span.span: Gets the list of eras in the .

value.span: 一个数组，它由值始终是当前纪元的单个元素组成。

span.span: An array that consists of a single element for which the value is always the current era.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的数组中的值是从1到最大年代号的数字。The values in the array returned by this property are numbers that range from 1 to the largest era number. 在第一个数组元素中返回最大纪元号, 最后一个元素中返回最小纪元号。The largest era number is returned in the first array element and the smallest era number is returned in the last element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一年中的某一天定义为从该年的第一天开始的天数。The day of the year is defined as the number of days from the first day of the year. 例如, 对于第一个月的第一天, 返回 1 , 在上个月的最后一天返回该年份中的总天数。For example, for the first day of the first month returns 1, and for the last day of the last month returns the total number of days in that year. 总数与返回的值相同。The total is the same as the value returned by . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet/CPP/taiwancalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet/CS/taiwancalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_AddGet/VB/taiwancalendar_addget.vb#1)]

summary.span: 计算指定纪元年份的闰月。

span.span: Calculates the leap month for a specified year and era.

returns.span: 返回值始终为 0，因为 类不支持闰月这一概念。

span.span: The return value is always 0 because the class does not support the notion of a leap month.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在支持闰月的概念的日历中, 闰月可以在特定月份之后或在一年中的任何月份之后发生。In a calendar that supports the notion of a leap month, the leap month can occur either after a particular month or after any month in a year. 例如, 方法返回1到13之间的一个数字, 用于指示与指定日期关联的月份。For example, the method returns a number between 1 and 13 that indicates the month associated with a specified date. 如果一年的第八个月和第九个月之间有一个闰月 , 则该方法将为第八个月返回 8, 为第八个月返回 9, 在第9个月返回10个月。If there is a leap month between the eighth and ninth months of the year, the method returns 8 for the eighth month, 9 for the leap eighth month, and 10 for the ninth month.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于通过将`time`参数设置为一年中的最后一天来确定该年份中的周数。This method can be used to determine the number of weeks in the year by setting the `time` parameter to the last day of the year. 属性包含可用于`rule`和`firstDayOfWeek`参数的区域性特定值。 The property contains culture-specific values that can be used for the `rule` and `firstDayOfWeek` parameters. 的属性包含默认值, 该值表示特定区域性的一周的第一天, 使用的属性中指定的日历表示该周的第一天。 The property of contains the default value that represents the first day of the week for a specific culture, using the calendar specified in the property of . 的 属性包含默认值, 该默认值使用的属性中指定的日历为特定区域性定义日历周。 The property of contains the default value that defines a calendar week for a specific culture, using the calendar specified in the property of . 例如, 在中, 1 月1日的方法返回1。For example, in , the method for January 1 returns 1. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何根据所使用的和值而产生的结果。The following code example shows how the result of varies depending on the and values used. 如果指定的日期是一年中的最后一天 , 则返回该年份的总周数。If the specified date is the last day of the year, returns the total number of weeks in that year. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear/CPP/yslin_calendar_getweekofyear.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear/CS/yslin_calendar_getweekofyear.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear/VB/yslin_calendar_getweekofyear.vb#1)]

param.name: year
param.span: 一个整数，用于表示年份。

span.span: An integer that represents the year.

param.span: 1 到 12 之间的一个整数，用于表示月份。

param.span: 一个整数，用于表示纪元。

summary.span: 确定指定纪元中的指定日期是否为闰日。

span.span: Determines whether the specified date in the specified era is a leap day.

returns.span: 如果指定的日期是闰日，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the specified day is a leap day; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 台湾日历中的闰年对应于公历中的相同闰年。Leap years in the Taiwan calendar correspond to the same leap years in the Gregorian calendar. 公历中的闰年定义为可被四整除的公历年份, 但它可被100整除。A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a Gregorian year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100. 但是, 400 可以整除的公历年是闰年。However, Gregorian years that are divisible by 400 are leap years. 一个常见年份有365天, 闰年有366天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 闰日是指仅在闰年发生的日期。A leap day is a day that occurs only in a leap year. 例如, 2 月29日是唯一的闰日。For example, the 29th day of February is the only leap day. ## Examples 下面的示例在每个纪元的五年中, 为第二个月的最后一天 (2 月) 调用。The following example calls for the last day of the second month (February) for five years in each of the eras. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.IsLeapDay/CPP/taiwancalendar_isleapday.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.IsLeapDay/CS/taiwancalendar_isleapday.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.IsLeapDay/VB/taiwancalendar_isleapday.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 台湾日历中的闰年对应于公历中的相同闰年。Leap years in the Taiwan calendar correspond to the same leap years in the Gregorian calendar. 公历中的闰年定义为可被四整除的公历年份, 但它可被100整除。A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a Gregorian year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100. 但是, 400 可以整除的公历年是闰年。However, Gregorian years that are divisible by 400 are leap years. 一个常见年份有365天, 闰年有366天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 闰月是只在闰年发生的整个月份。A leap month is an entire month that occurs only in a leap year. 台湾日历没有闰月。The Taiwan calendar does not have any leap months. ## Examples 下面的示例在当前纪元中的五年内调用所有月份。The following example calls for all the months in five years in the current era. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.IsLeapMonth#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.IsLeapMonth/CPP/taiwancalendar_isleapmonth.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.IsLeapMonth#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.IsLeapMonth/CS/taiwancalendar_isleapmonth.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.IsLeapMonth#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.IsLeapMonth/VB/taiwancalendar_isleapmonth.vb#1)]

in the Gregorian calendar.

summary.span: 获取 类支持的最早日期和时间。

span.span: Gets the earliest date and time supported by the class.

value.span: 类支持的最早日期和时间, 该日期和时间等效于1912年1月1日开始的那一刻

span.span: The earliest date and time supported by the class, which is equivalent to the first moment of January 1, 1912 C.E.
in the Gregorian calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Microsoft Visual Basic 将当天的时间表示为支持的最小日期的指定时间, 即公元0001年1月1日Microsoft Visual Basic represents time of day as the specified time on the minimum date supported by , which is January 1, 0001 C.E. 但是, 类不支持此最小日期。However, the class does not support that minimum date. 因此, 如果应用程序调用一个方法来使用当前日历格式化当天的时间, 但未指定格式说明符, 则格式设置将使用 ISO 8601 可排序 ("s") 日期/时间模式格式说明符, 而不是默认的常规 ("G") 日期/时间模式格式说明符。Consequently, if your application calls a method to format the time of day using the current calendar but does not specify a format specifier, formatting uses the ISO 8601 sortable ("s") date/time pattern format specifier instead of the default general ("G") date/time pattern format specifier. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取日历的最小值和最大值。The following code example gets the minimum value and the maximum value of the calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_MinMax/CPP/taiwancalendar_minmax.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_MinMax/CS/taiwancalendar_minmax.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar_MinMax/VB/taiwancalendar_minmax.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override int ToFourDigitYear (int year);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 ToFourDigitYear(int32 year) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToFourDigitYear (year As Integer) As Integer
public: override int ToFourDigitYear(int year);
override this.ToFourDigitYear : int -> int

param.name: year
param.span: 一个两位数或四位数的整数，用于表示要转换的年份。

span.span: A two-digit or four-digit integer that represents the year to convert.

summary.span: 使用 属性将指定的年份转换为四位数年份，以确定相应的纪元。

span.span: Converts the specified year to a four-digit year by using the property to determine the appropriate century.

returns.span: 包含 的四位数表示形式的整数。

span.span: An integer that contains the four-digit representation of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现 。This method implements . 由于台湾日历中的年份通常小于四位数, 因此此实现始终返回`year`参数的值。Because the year in the Taiwan calendar is typically less than four digits long, this implementation always returns the value of the `year` parameter. 支持两位数年份或四位数年份。 supports either a two-digit year or a four-digit year. 如果传递两位数的年份值 (小于 100), 则会使方法根据表示适当世纪的值将值转换为四位值。Passing a two-digit year value (less than 100) causes the method to convert the value to a four-digit value according to the value representing the appropriate century. 如果应用程序提供了在支持的日历范围内的四位数年份值, 则该方法将返回实际输入值。If the application supplies a four-digit year value that is within the supported calendar range to , the method returns the actual input value. 如果应用程序提供了一个在支持的日历范围之外的四位数值, 或者如果它提供负值, 则该方法将引发异常。If the application supplies a four-digit value that is outside the supported calendar range, or if it supplies a negative value, the method throws an exception.

exception.span: 超出了日历支持的范围。

span.span: is outside the range supported by the calendar.

summary.span: 获取或设置可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。

value.span: 可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。

span.span: The last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性实现 。This property implements . 由于台湾日历中的年份通常小于四位数, 因此此实现默认情况下返回 99, 并且不影响的返回值。Because the year in the Taiwan calendar is typically less than four digits long, this implementation returns 99 by default and does not affect the return value of .
